quotes.quote: Are you having fun? Dont forget ~ for even more fun!
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Need something and can't get it right away? Consider spawning it yourself.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Why go around when you can just delete your way forward.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Something take a bit long to complete? If only time could be scaled.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu
